_header: Jesu be Thou my joy all melody and sweetness
Note:
For further MSS see Allen (1927)
XAllen, Hope Emily. Writings Attributed to Richard Rolle. New York: Modern Language Association of America, 1927, 170-7.
Subjects: prayers, to Christ; Christ, prayers to
_description: Three irregular rhyming lines in Rolle’s English Psalter (Ps. XVI)

BodHat12.Transcription:
Ihesu be þou my ioy al melody and swetnesand lere me for to
                    synge þe sange of þi louynge
BodHat12.Editions:
Allen,  Hope Emily. 
             English Writings of Richard Rolle.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1931: 15.

OxfUni64.Transcription:
Jhesu be þu my ioy all melody and swetnesand lere me forto syng
                    þe sang of þi louyng
OxfUni64.Editions:
Bramley,  Henry Ramsden. 
             The Psalter, or Psalms of David and certain canticles.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1884: 204.
